com.embeddedunveiled.serial

Class SerialComByteStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComByteStream

  • public final class SerialComByteStream
extends java.lang.Object

    Note that scm is non-blocking I/O.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialComByteStream(SerialComManager scm, long handle)
      Allocates a new SerialComByteStream object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeInStream()
      This method releases the InputStream object associated with the operating handle.
      void closeOutStream()
      This method releases the OutputStream object associated with the operating handle.
      com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComInputStream getSerialComInputStream()
      This method creates and returns a InputStream object associated with handle and scm instance.
      com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComOutputStream getSerialComOutputStream()
      This method creates and returns a OutputStream object associated with handle and scm instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialComByteStream

        public SerialComByteStream(SerialComManager scm,
                   long handle)

        Allocates a new SerialComByteStream object.

        Parameters:
        handle - of the port to be used for reading and writing
        scm - instance of scm with which this port is opened

    • Method Detail

      • getSerialComOutputStream

        public com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComOutputStream getSerialComOutputStream()

        This method creates and returns a OutputStream object associated with handle and scm instance.

      • getSerialComInputStream

        public com.embeddedunveiled.serial.SerialComInputStream getSerialComInputStream()

        This method creates and returns a InputStream object associated with handle and scm instance.

      • closeOutStream

        public void closeOutStream()

        This method releases the OutputStream object associated with the operating handle.

        To actually close the port closeComPort() method should be used.

      • closeInStream

        public void closeInStream()

        This method releases the InputStream object associated with the operating handle.

        To actually close the port closeComPort() method should be used.
